metadata.title: CVE-2013-4739 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The MSM camera driver for the Linux kernel 3.x, as used in QualcommInnovation Center (QuIC) Android contributions for MSM devices and otherproducts, allows attackers to obtain sensitive information from kernelstack memory via (1) a crafted MSM_MCR_IOCTL_EVT_GET ioctl call, related todrivers/media/platform/msm/camera_v1/mercury/msm_mercury_sync.c, or (2) acrafted MSM_JPEG_IOCTL_EVT_GET ioctl call, related todrivers/media/platform/msm/camera_v2/jpeg_10/msm_jpeg_sync.c.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
